gen:link.msg:message: `AdditionalFTEDeployed` MOET minimaal één keer voorkomen, omdat de gerapporteerde waarde van `SectorBi` gelijk is aan `mbo-vo`. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_TemporaryArrangementAdditionalFundingLOBMBO_PrtValueThnExistenceCovPU2_SectorBi')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_TemporaryArrangementAdditionalFundingLOBMBO_PrtValueThnExistenceCovPU2_SectorBi return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}
